Wilmer Jaime O. V. tiene 27 años, Vive en Unión Libre vive con la compañero y con los hijos,  vive en el cantón de Ventanas Provincia los Ríos. Tiene 1 hijo.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. NUEVO HORIZONTE se encuentra ubicada En el recinto Cachel y Grande, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz, fréjol gandul., esta actividad llevan mucho tiempo haciéndolo.
  
Wilmer Jaime se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz, fréjol gandul. Compra sus productos en el Agro Karlyta y vende su producto en la comercial Olivo.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos agrícolas y fertilizantes para el cultivo de maíz, arroz, fréjol gandul. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentan desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es poder comprar una finca 

Le gusta el deporte.
texts.en:
Wilmer Jaime O. V. is 27 years old, and lives in a common-law marriage. He lives with his partner and their children in the canton of Ventanas in the province of Rios. They have one son.

The members of the V.R.C. NUEVO HORIZONTE ("New Horizon communal bank") are located in the recinto of Cachel y Grande, which belongs to the canton Ventanas. This communal bank is involved with short-cycle agricultural work such as the sowing of corn, rice, and pigeon peas, which takes a lot of time to do.

Wilmer Jaime is a farmer who sows corn, rice and pigeon peas. He buys his products in Agro Karlyta and sells his produce at the store Olivo. He is requesting the loan in order to purchase agricultural supplies and fertilizers to harvest corn, rice and pigeon peas. The support of the loan will help him meet his needs financially. He is faced with challenges such as insect plagues, crop diseases and variations in the weather. His dream is to be able to buy a farm. He enjoys sports.

loans.use: agricultural supplies and fertilizers

loans.name: Miriam Judith

texts.es:
Miriam Judith  C. R. tiene 27 años de edad, Es casada, vive con la  familia  y con el hijo, vive en el cantón de San Miguel en la Provincia de Bolívar. Tiene 1 hijo.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. YAGUI GRANDE se encuentra ubicada A 30 minutos de la Oficina San Miguel, perteneciente al cantón San Miguel, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz y papas, esta actividad llevan mucho tiempo haciéndolo.

Miriam Judith  se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y papas. Compra sus productos en Ambato y San Miguel y los vende en la feria de San Miguel los días jueves.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos agrícolas y fertilizantes para el cultivo de maíz y papas. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentan desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es tener un terreno.

Le gusta el deporte.
texts.en:
Miriam Judith C. R. is 27 years old, married, and lives with her family and her son. She lives in the canton San Miguel in the province of Bolivar. She has one son.

The members of the Yagui Grande communal bank are located about 30 minutes from the office in San Miguel, which belongs to the canton San Miguel. This communal bank is involved with short-cycle agricultural work such as sowing corn and potatoes, which requires a lot of time to do.

Miriam Judith is a farmer who sows corn and potatoes. She buys her products in Ambato in San Miguel and sells her produce in the San Miguel market on Thursdays. She is requesting the loan in order to purchase agricultural supplies and fertilizers to sow corn and potatoes. The loan will help her meet her needs financially. She is faced with challenges such as insect plagues, crop diseases, and the variations in the weather. Her dream is to have her own land. She enjoys sports.

loans.use: agricultural supplies and fertilizers

loans.name: Alfredo Enrique

texts.es:
Alfredo Enrique B. F. tiene 21 años de edad, Vive en Unión Libre vive con la compañera,  vive en el cantón de Ventanas Provincia los Ríos. No tiene hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. NUEVO HORIZONTE se encuentra ubicada En el recinto Cachel y Grande, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz, fréjol gandul., esta actividad llevan mucho tiempo haciéndolo.
  
Alfredo Enrique se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz, fréjol gandul. Compra sus productos en el Agro Karlyta y vende su producto en la comercial Olivo.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos agrícolas y fertilizantes para el cultivo de maíz, arroz, fréjol gandul. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentan desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es dar mejoramiento a la vivienda.

Le gusta el deporte.
texts.en:
Alfredo Enrique B. F. is 21 years old, and lives in a common-law marriage. He lives with his partner in the canton Ventanas, in the province of Rios. He doesn't have any children.

The members of the communal bank Nuevo Horizonte ("New Horizon") are located in the recinto Cachel y Grande, which belongs to the canton Ventanas. This communal bank is involved with short-cycle agricultural activities such as sowing corn, rice and pigeon peas, which takes a lot of time to do.

Alfredo Enrique is a farmer who sows corn, rice and pigeon peas. He buys his products in the Agro Karlyta and sells his produce in the store Olivo. He is requesting the loan in order to buy agricultural supplies and fertilizers in order to sow corn, rice and pigeon peas. The support of the loan will help him meet his needs financially. He is faced with challenges such as insect plagues, crop diseases and variations in the weather. His dream is to be able to improve his home. He enjoys sports.

loans.use: agricultural supplies and fertilizers

loans.name: Queta

texts.es: Queta, de 53 años es una mujer muy sencilla y trabajadora, vive en su casa propia y lo que más desea es sobre salir en la vida. El restaurante de Queta esta ubicado en una de las calles principales de la ciudad de Tarma, el cual es muy concurrido por las personas, debido a lo sabroso de la comida y a la variedad de platos que ofrece al publico, lo cual a hecho que su restaurante, sea uno de los más conocidos de la ciudad. Lo que más le gusta es atender a sus clientes y le gusta hacerlo bien, puesto que sabe que una buena atención hará que vuelvan pronto, lleva 4 año y medio cocinando para sus clientes y lo más difícil para ella es atender al mismo tiempo a todas las personas que asisten a su restaurante, espera poder mejorar la infraestructura de su negocio en el futuro y así poder brindar una mejor atención a sus clientes. Este es el noveno crédito con MFP, sabe que tiene que pagar todas sus cuotas a tiempo y esta segura de poder hacerlo, al igual como hizo con sus primeros créditos, en su banco comunal siente que esta realizando una buena labor y que le tienen mucho respeto por la puntualidad que demuestra. Con los mil nuevos soles solicitados, renovará sus utensilios de cocina y arreglará mejor el ambiente de su restaurante.
texts.en:
Queta, 52, is an unassuming, hard working woman living in her own house; what she most wants is to get ahead in life.  

Queta’s restaurant is located on one of Tarma’s main streets.  It is very popular with people due to the tasty preparation of her dishes and the variety of dishes she offers to the public.  This has make the restaurant one of the best known in the city.

What she enjoys the most is taking care of her customers and she likes to do a good job of it because she knows that good attention leads to repeat visits.  She has been cooking for her customers for four and a half years and the most difficult part of it for her is having to tend to all the customers who come to the restaurant at the same time.  She hopes to improve the restaurant’s infrastructure in the future so that she can provide better customer service.

This is her 9th loan with MFP and she is aware that she must repay on time and is sure she will be able to do so just as she’s done with her previous loans.  She feels that she is doing a good job in her communal bank and that she is respected because of her punctuality.

She will use the requested 1000 new soles to renew her kitchen utensils and fix up the restaurant’s ambience.

loans.use: To buy kitchen utensils and refurbish her restaurant.

loans.name: Ronaldo

texts.es: Ronaldo, de 29 años, es un hombre muy amable y trabajador, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposa Deys de 26 años y sus 3 queridos hijos, a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. Los años le han enseñado a Ronaldo, que tiene que trabajar muy duro si quiere que sus cultivos sean los mejores de su poblado y es así que con mucho esfuerzo a logrado que sus sembríos de café, achiote, piña y stevia, sean muy solicitados en los mercados de la ciudad de Pichanaki. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cosechar sus productos, lleva 8 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil fumigar sus sembríos, ya que los químicos que usa son muy peligrosos. Con el tiempo, desea sembrar todas sus tierras, ya que así podrá mejorar su producción. Este es el segundo crédito con MFP, siempre ha sido muy puntual en el pago de sus cuotas y espera serlo ahora también. En su banco comunal es un socio muy solidario con el resto de sus compañeras. Con los mil nuevos soles solicitados, comprará plantas de café, ya que actualmente es lo que mejor se esta vendiendo.
texts.en: Ronaldo, 29, is a very friendly and hardworking man.  He lives in his own home with his wife, Deys, who is 26, and their 3 beloved children, for whom they want to provide a better quality of life.  Ronaldo has learned over time that he has to work very hard if he wants his crops to be the best in the town, and so with a lot of effort he has succeeded in producing coffee, achiote, pineapple and stevia crops that are highly sought after in the markets in the city of Pichanaki.  What he likes most about his work is harvesting his products.  He has been doing this work for 8 years, and what he considers most difficult is fumigating his crops since the chemicals he uses are very dangerous.  Over time, he hopes to cultivate all of his lands, since in this way he will be able to improve his production.  This is the second loan he has taken from MFP, and he has always been very punctual with his payments; he expects to do the same with this loan.  In his communal bank he is very supportive with the rest of his fellow group members.  With the 1,000 Peruvian soles he requests he will buy coffee plants, since coffee is what is now selling the best.

loans.use: to buy coffee plants

loans.name: Juan Alberto

texts.es:
El Senor Juan Alberto S. es agriculto, tiene 41 anos de edad, originario de la Comarca El Quebracho, Miraflor, del Departamento de Esteli; soltero y tiene 5 hijos.
El nos relata que empezo ayudando a su Papa en las actividades agricolas, a la corta edad de 5 anos, abondono sus estudios en el 4to grado de primaria. A los 15 anos de edad ayudaba sembrar granos basicos y Papa.
En los anos 80 su Papa obtuvo del gobierno, un terreno, debido a la Reforma Agraria que hubo en esa epoca para que la trabajara como Patrimonio Familiar.
El solicito este credito, para la siembra de 1/2 manzana de Papa y compra de Insumos. El piensa que con este credito podra obtener mayores ingresos. Desea brindarles a sus hijos un mejor nivel de vida, por lo que esta apoyandolos para que estudien y que ellos puedan ser duenos de su propio negocio.
texts.en:
Juan Alberto S. is a 41 year-old farmer who is a native of the El Quebracho district of Miraflor, in the department of Esteli.  He is single and has 5 children.

He tells us that he started out working in agriculture with his father when he was only 5 years old.  He left school in the 4th grade.  At 15, he used to help his father cultivate staple grains and potatoes.

In the 1980s his father got some land from the government due to an agrarian reform program that existed during this period of time, which was designed to enable farmers to own their own land.

He requests this loan to sow a half-manzana (a little less than an acre) of land with potatoes, and to buy supplies.  He thinks that with this loan he will be able to have higher earnings.  He hopes to provide his children with a higher standard of living, so he is supporting them while they are in school.  He hopes that they can someday have their own businesses.

loans.use: to plant potatoes and buy supplies

loans.name: Royer

texts.es: Royer, de 23 años, es un joven muy sencillo y trabajador, vive en su casa propia y lo que más desea es forjarse un buen futuro. Los extensos campos de sembrado que posee Royer, son el fruto de una vida de arduo trabajo y una firme convicción de sobresalir en la vida, sus productos son muy solicitados en el mercado de la ciudad de Pichanaki, ya que su fama de cosechar cultivos de calidad le ayuda a vender sus productos a muy buenos precios. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cuidar sus sembríos de las plagas que pueden aquejarlos, lleva 7 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es transportar los sacos de café y plátano, ya que son muy pesados y le cansan mucho. En adelante, espera comprarse un carro, con el cual pueda hacer más fácil el traslado de sus productos. Este es el primer crédito con MFP, sabe que este aporte le será muy beneficioso para el desarrollo de su trabajo. En su banco comunal es un socio muy alegre y siempre pone orden en las reuniones. Con los mil nuevos soles solicitados, comprará abono e insecticidas para sus sembríos, ya que desea que sus cultivos sean más productivos.
texts.en: 23 year old Royer is a straightforward and hardworking young man. He lives in his own house, and what he most wants is to forge himself a good future. The extensive planted fields that he owns are the fruit of a life of hard work and a firm intention to succeed in life. His produce is very sought-after in the market of the city Pichanaki. His fame for harvesting quality produce helps him to sell his crops at very good prices. What he most likes about his work is guarding his plants from the pests that may afflict them. He has been doing this work for 7 years and thinks that the most difficult thing is transporting the sacks of coffee and bananas as they are very heavy and tire him out. In the future, he hopes to buy himself a car, which will make it easier to transport his produce. This is his first credit from MFP, and he knows that this will be very beneficial to the development of his work. He is a very cheerful member of his community bank and always keeps order at meetings. With the $375 that he is requesting, he will buy fertilizer and insecticide for his plants, as he wants his crops to be more productive.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and insecticide

loans.name: Uber

texts.es: Uber, de 35 años, es un hombre muy amable y sencillo, vive en su cas propia junto a su esposa Charo de 30 años y su querido hijo Jhon de 14 años, quienes son el principal motivo de todos sus esfuerzos. El trabajo al que se dedica Uber, es la siembra de cacao y café, los cuales después de cosecharlos, vende en el mercado de la ciudad de Tarma, en donde ya tiene varios clientes, que sabiendo de la calidad de su producto no dudan en esperarlo para comprarle todo al por mayor. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es sembrar sus tierras y hacerlas fértiles y productivas, lleva 15 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es fumigar sus chacras, ya que tiene que hacerlo con mucho cuidado, puesto que no quiere que los químicos le causen una enfermedad. En adelante, espera seguir vendiendo sus productos, pero para mejorar sus ganancias deS. comprarse un auto, con el cual él mismo pueda transportar sus cultivos. Este es el primer crédito con MFP, sabe que tiene que pagar sus cuotas puntualmente, si deS. acceder a otro crédito en el futuro. En su banco comunal, es un socio muy responsable y preocupado por el bienestar de su grupo. Con los mil nuevos soles solicitados, comprará insecticidas, ya que tiene que fumigar sus siembras.
texts.en: Uber is 35 years old and is a friendly and simple man.  He lives in his own house with his 30-year-old wife, Charo, and their 14-year-old son, Jhon, who are the main reason for all of his efforts.  Uber works planting cacao and coffee which, after harvesting, he sells in the Tarma city market where he already has several customers that are familiar with the quality of his goods and don’t hesitate in waiting to buy everything from him at wholesale.  What he likes most about his work is sowing his lands and making them fertile and productive.  He has been working in this area for 15 years and he considers the most difficult part to be fumigating his farmlands because it must be done carefully, as he does not want the chemicals to make him sick.  In the future, he hopes to continue selling his products but in order to improve his income, he wants to buy himself a car that he can use to transport his crops.  This is his first loan with MFP and he knows that he has to make his loan payments on time if he wants to access another loan in the future.  He is a very responsible member of his communal bank and is concerned about the group’s well-being.  With the 1,000 Peruvian Nuevos Soles (PEN) requested, he will purchase insecticides because he needs to fumigate his crops.

loans.use: To purchase insecticides.

loans.name: America

texts.es: America, de 38 años, es una mujer muy amable y trabajadora, vive en su casa propia junto a sus 4 queridos hijos y lo que más desea es brindarles una mejor calidad de vida. Con mucho esfuerzo America a logrado trabajar sus tierras y volverlas muy productivas, ella cultiva, papa y alverja, productos que posteriormente lleva a vender hasta el mercado de la ciudad de Tarma, donde las vende al por mayor. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cuidar sus cultivos, lleva 10 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es transportar sus productos, ya que los sacos que lleva son muy pesados y la cansan mucho. Para más adelante, desea comprar nuevas tierras para ampliar sus plantaciones. Este es el noveno crédito con MFP, ha sido muy puntual en sus anteriores créditos y espera serlo también ahora. En su banco comunal es una socia muy participativa y siempre esta al tanto de los acuerdos a los que llegan en su grupo. Con los mil nuevos soles solicitados, hará limpiar su chacra y contratará peones, para que la ayuden en el cultivo.
texts.en: America is 38 years old and is a very friendly and hardworking woman.  She lives in her own house with her four children and what she wants most is to provide them with a better quality of life.  With a lot of effort, America has been able to work her lands and make them very productive.  She grows potatoes and peas – products which she later brings to sell wholesale at the Tarma city market.  What she likes most about her work is caring for her crops.  She has been in this area of work for 10 years and considers the most difficult part to be transporting her crops because the sacks that she carries are very heavy and tiring.  In the future, she wants to purchase new lands to expand her fields.  This is her ninth loan with MFP and she has been very punctual in repaying her previous loans and hopes to do so now as well.  She is an active participant in her communal bank and is always aware of the agreements that have been reached in the group.  With the 1,000 Peruvian Nuevos Soles (PEN) requested, she will clear her farmland and hire workers to help with the farming.

loans.use: To hire workers to help clear and sow the lands.

loans.name: Rosa Maria

texts.es: Rosa María C., es una cliente distinguida y esto debido a su buen historial y la cultura de pagos en los créditos anteriores, este es el sexto crédito y  además de su excelente historial, es una persona que ha aprovechado el crédito para invertir y mejorar el proyecto planeado, llevando a cabo siempre la misión de mejorar y aprovechar al máximo la utilidad que le da el obtener el crédito y en esta ocasión ella quiere invertir en el mejoramiento de la casa, remodelando el interior de su cocina  para una mejor comodidad  y ahorrar espacio.
texts.en: Rosa María C. is a very distinguished borrower because of her good repayment history from previous loans. This is her sixth loan and in addition to her excellent credit history, she is a person that has taken advantage of the loans to invest and improve her planned projects. She always achieves her goal of taking the maximum advantage of the loan and utilizing it to the fullest. On this occasion, she wants to invest in the improvement of her house, remodeling the kitchen interior so that it is more comfortable and to save space.

loans.use: To remodel her house.

loans.name: Ayoavi William

texts.fr: M. William est âgée de 38 ans et a un enfant.  Il est informaticien de profession mais  il a associé la vente des accessoires des ordinateurs.  En effet, il  a commencé en 2007 cette activité et s’approvisionne dans le magasin computer plus au niveau du quartier protestant. Il revend ensuite dans son magasin à Dékon.  Il demande un prêt pour acheter 50 cartons de CD et DVD et un ordinateur.
texts.en: M. Willima is 38 years old and has one child. He is a computer scientist by profession, but in addition he sells computer accessories. In fact, he launched this business in 2007, stocking up in a computer store in the Protestant district. He then resells in his store in Dékon. He is seeking a loan to purchase 50 boxes of CDs and DVDs and one computer.

loans.use: Puchasing CDs, DVDs, and a computer

loans.name: Diana

texts.es: Diana, de 20 años, es una joven madre de familia muy sencilla y trabajadora, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo Jance de 23 años y su querida hija Kenji de 3 años, a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. Trabajando arduamente Diana a logrado hacer de sus cultivos de papa y alverja, uno de los más productivos de su poblado, todas las mañanas sin importar las condiciones del clima, sale a trabajar sus chacras, ya que sabe que de ello dependen los ingresos que obtendrá por la venta de sus productos. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cultivar sus tierras, lleva 3 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es transportar sus productos hasta la ciudad de Tarma. Con el tiempo, desea comprar más tierras, para incrementar su producción. Este es el primer crédito con MFP y espera ser muy puntual en el pago de sus cuotas, en su banco comunal es una socia muy respetada, debido a la responsabilidad que demuestra. Con los dos mil nuevos soles solicitados, comprará más abono para hacer más fértiles sus tierras.
texts.en: 20 year old Diana is a simple, hard-working, young mother. She lives in her own home along with her husband, 23 year old Jane, and their beloved 3 year old daughter, Kenji. She wishes to provide a better quality of life for her family. By working hard Diana has made her potatoes and peas the most productive crops in her town. Every morning regardless of the weather she leaves to work on her farmland, as she knows that her family depends on the income she will receive from the sales of her crops. What she most likes about farming is working the land. She has been farming for 3 years and considers the most difficult part transporting her products to the city of Tarma. With time, she wishes to buy more land in order to increase her production. This is her first loan with MFP and she expects to be very punctual in her loan payments; in her communal bank she is a much respected member due to the responsibility she demonstrates. With the two thousand nuevos soles she is seeking, she will buy more manure to make her land more fertile.

loans.use: Buy sacks of manure

loans.name: Jibirila

texts.fr: M. Jibirila a 37 ans  et est marié. Il a en charge 2 enfants. Il est tailleur  brodeur  de profession mais a associé la vente de Bazins et les fils à coudre pour mieux s’occuper de ses enfants. Il compte dans cette activité 12 ans déjà et s’approvisionne au grand marché de Lomé. Il revend ensuite dans son atelier.  Il a 2 apprentis qui l’aident dans ses activités. IL pense acheter une machine à coudre et 5 pièces de Bazins avec le nouveau crédit.
texts.en: Mr. Jibirila is 37 years old and married. HEehas two children in his care. He is a tailor and does embroidery work; in addition,   he sells traditional “bazins” fabric and thread, in order to be able to better provide for his children. He has 12 years of experience in this field and stocks up at the big market in Lomé. He then resells the wares in his shop. He has two apprentices who help him in his business. He plans to buy a sewing machine and five sets of the “bazins “fabric with this new loan.

loans.use: Purchasing a sewing machine and tradtional fabrics

loans.name: Kole Sere Group

texts.en:
Widelyne E. is the coordinator of her group, Kole Sere, which translates to “piece together to save.” She live in her home, made of a simple structure, with her two small children. She says that her most difficult challenges are being able to keep her inventory fully stocked and competition from other spice vendors.

Widelyne is excited to be taking her second loan from Esperanza after having successfully repaid her previous loan and grown her business. She is grateful for the opportunity to borrow from an institution because she says that it makes it much easier on her in comparison with borrowing from loan sharks. She feels like she has made huge progress from when she first started her business with the proceeds of selling a mother hen. Now, she sells multiple natural spices in a variety of local markets and will use this loan to further this business. With hopes of one day getting married, opening up a storefront location and expanding her merchandise, Widelyne is content to be in the process and to be able to better provide for her children. 

This Esperanza associate’s story is representative of her group and of Esperanza's Haitian clients in general. Her group is located in Cayes, Haiti. This area, like nearly all impoverished areas of Haiti, suffers from unreliable running water (none of which is potable) and electricity.

loans.use: To further her business selling multiple varieties of natural spices, including cloves, peppers, basil and tomato paste.

loans.name: Efoé Daniel

texts.fr: M. Daniel est âgé de 36 ans et père d’un enfant. Pour   répondre   aux besoins de sa petite famille, il fait la vente des habits  et cumule 10 ans déjà. Il achète les habits à Doubaï    et au marché d’adawlato. Il revend ensuite les marchandises à côté de L’hôtel Montréal sur le boulevard de 13 janvier.  IL demande un prêt  pour se réapprovisionner.
texts.en: Daniel is 36 years old and has one child. In order to provide for his small family, he sells clothing, and has 10 years of experience in this business. He buys clothing in Dubai and at the Adawlato market. He then resells his wares next to the Montreal Hotel at the boulevard de 13 janvier. He is seeking a loan to replenish his stock.

loans.use: Purchasing clothing

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Awovi Mawussinu

texts.fr: Mlle  Mawussinu est âgée de 33 ans. Elle est née à Kpalimé mais habite Bè Kpéhénou. Il est dans son deuxième cycle de prêt. Elle est coiffeuse de profession  mais associe la vente de mèches , perruque et les produits de beauté. Elle a commencé en 2007 cette activité et s’approvisionne au grand marché de Lomé. Elle revend en suite en face de la pharmacie à Bè Kpéhénou.  Elle demande un prêt pour acheter une douzaine de mèches et perruque et de  nouveaux lots de produits de beauté.
texts.en: Ms Mawussini is 33 years old and was born in Kpalimé but lives in Bè Kpéhénou. She is currently repaying her second loan from WAGES. She is a hairdresser by profession but also sells hair wigs, extensions and beauty products. She began this trade in 2007 and stocks up on products at the big market in Lomé, which she then re-sells in front of the pharmacy in Bè Kpéhénou. She is asking for another loan in order to purchase two dozen hair wigs, extensions and other beauty products.

loans.use: Purchasing hair wigs, extensions and other beauty products

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es: La Sra. T. es una persona muy trabajadora y responsable en este momento ya esta separada de su esposo pero aun así siempre a deseado mejorar su calidad de vida en la casa donde antes vivía con su familia se la dejaron a un hijo y con dinero propio que poco a poco ha ido juntando con esfuerzo y gracias a su trabajo va levantando una casita la cual quiere que solo sea de ella, anteriormente solicito crédito para colocar una losa la cual ya concluyo y ahora desea elabora un cuarto y el crédito lo pide para levantar las paredes del mismo, desea darles a sus nietos un hogar acogedor para cuando quieran visitarla.
texts.en: Mrs. T. is a hard-working and responsible person who at this moment is separated from her husband. Even so she has always wished to improve her quality of life in the house where she used to live with her family. They left her with a son and her own money which little by little, with effort, she has been saving, and thanks to her work she is building a small house that will be entirely hers. Previously she received a loan to lay a slab foundation which is now finished and she would like to build a room. The loan will be used to build walls. She wishes to give her grandchildren a comfortable home for when they want to visit her.

loans.use: Build walls

loans.name: Maria Herlinda

texts.es: La señora María Herlinda P. Q. quiere empezar la construcción en planta alta de su casa por que su casa es de interés social y tiene muy poco espacio, como son 6 personas que la habitan es necesario ampliar la vivienda para que cada uno tenga su propio espacio. María Herlinda, su esposo y una hija  trabajan en maquiladora para poder sostener los gastos familiares.
texts.en: Mrs. María Herlinda P. Q. wants to begin construction of the second floor of her home because her house is social welfare housing and she has very little space, as there are 6 people who live there, it is necessary to expand the home so each can have their own space. María Herlinda, her husband, and daughter work in a factory in order to be able to support the family expenses.

loans.use: Begin construction of the second floor

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es: La señora María Del Carmen R. Valdez desde hace varios años quedo viuda, por lo que  tuvo que trabajar para poder sostener los gastos de la familia, con el tiempo la pensionaron por la edad lo cual recibe cada mes su dinero. Para tener un dinero extra vende ropa usada y artículos para el hogar desde hace 12 años, al que en este momento desea invertir, para que sus ventas sean incrementadas por la época navideña.
texts.en:
María Del Carmen R. Valdez was widowed several years ago.  She had to work to be able to cover the family expenses.  In time she retired due to age, and she receives money every month. 

In order to have extra money, she has been selling used clothes and household items for 12 years.

She now wants to invest in merchandise so that her sales will increase during the Christmas season

loans.use: Stock her business

loans.name: Cecilia

texts.es: La Sra. cecilia es una persona que  vive con su hermano mayor, y una hermana que esta en los estados unidos, ella ha estado mejorando la casa donde vive desde hace mas de 20 años, y actualmente están remodelando el techo y las paredes del interior de la casa, ella trabaja en el departamento de contabilidad de una empresa y esta solicitando el crédito porque quiere recibir el año nuevo con las paredes y el techo de su casa remodelados y con pintura nueva, ya que actualmente los tiene solo con el enjarre de cemento, y ella se sentiría muy a gusto ver que sus familiares al visitarla  vean que la casa ha ido mejorando.
texts.en: Cecilia lives with her older brother and has a sister who lives in the United States.  She has been improving the home where she lives for more than 20 years, and currently she is remodeling the roof and the walls of the interior of the house.  She works in the accounting department of a business, and is requesting the loan because she wants to enter the new year with the walls and the roof of her home remodeled and with new paint, since currently they are only plaster.  She would be very pleased to see her family visit her so they can see that the house has been improved.

loans.use: To remodel the interior of her home, the roof, and the walls

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Miguel

texts.es:
El señor Miguel S. Mejía no apare en la fotografía por razones laborales, por que aparece su esposa la señora Evangelina Limón quien se encontraba en lugar. 
 
Miguel S. Mejía y su esposa cuenta con un negocio de la venta de ropa usada y artículos para el hogar desde hace 2 años. El negocio esta ubicado en la casa de una hija donde se puede exhibir la ropa ya que es una calle muy transitada. Miguel desea comprar más mercancía para que sus ventas se incrementen.
texts.en:
Miguel S. M. is not in the above photograph due to his work schedule which makes it difficult to find him at home, for this reason his wife, Evangelina Limon, is photographed.

Miguel S. Mejía and his wife have had a business selling used clothing and items for the home for 2 years. The business is located in his daughter’s home where he can exhibit the clothing as the street a very busy one. Miguel wishes to buy more merchandise in order to increase his sales.

loans.use: Stock her clothing business

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Georgina

texts.es: Georgina González Hernández desde hace 3 años se dedica a la venta de ropa usada pues ese es su único ingreso para poder sostener los gastos de la casa. La señora nos solicita un préstamo para comprar mercancía de temporada para que sus ventas se incrementen y así generar más ganancias.
texts.en: Georgina González Hernández has been selling used clothes for 3 years. This is her only source of income to cover her household's expenses. She seeks this loan so that she can purchase seasonal merchandise to grow her sales and generate additional earnings.

loans.use: Purchase of merchandise

loans.name: Octavio

texts.es: Octavio Salazar Valdés es un hombre muy trabajador que desea a ofrecer a su hijos un mejor patrimonio; es por ello que el crédito lo solicita para darle mantenimiento a su vivienda ya que necesita impermeabilizar y pintarla para esto el necesita comprar los materiales y pagar mano de obra.
texts.en: Octavio Salazar Valdés is a very hardworking man who wants to offer a better estate to his children, so he's seeking this loan to make repairs to his home, which needs to be weather-proofed and painted. To do this he needs to purchase the materials and pay for manual labor.

loans.use: To weatherproof and paint his home

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy materials for his business

loans.name: Kory Pankaritas Group

texts.es:
La Banca Comunal  “KORY PANKARITAS”, (en lengua aymara quiere decir Flor de Oro), está solicitando su tercer crédito en el centro focal de Villa Exaltación, un total de  9  personas integran este grupo, 8 mujeres y 1 varón.

Los negocios de las señoras son diferentes, como por ejemplo: venta de cajas de madera, costura y venta de ropa deportiva, atención de brostería (pollo frito), venta de mantas, venta de fruta, venta de comida.

La Banca Comunal Alpacoma II está dirigida por una mesa directiva, a la cabeza se encuentra la presidenta, la señora Justina .

La señora Justina tiene un hogar conformado por ella y sus cuatro hijos, ella indica que es divorciada.   El negocio de la señora Justina es la venta de  verdura y fruta,  también tiene un negocio de alquiler de vajilla.  El crédito de ahora es para instalar una pensión (en su defecto comprar una máquina).
Los cierto es que la señora Justina desea ampliar el negocio.

Cuando le consultamos a la señora Justina sobre lo que le gusta de Pro Mujer ella responde que le gusta compartir con las señoras de su grupo.
texts.en:
The “KORY PANKARITAS” community bank ('Kory Pankaritas' means 'Golden Flower' in the Aymara language) are requesting their third loan as part of the Villa Exaltación regional office.  The group has 9 members: 8 women and 1 man.

The members' businesses are varied and include, for example: selling wooden boxes, sewing and selling sports clothing, selling fried chicken, selling blankets, selling fruit and selling meals.

The community bank is run by an executive committee and the head of the committee is the president, Justina.

Justina lives with her four children.  She tells us that she is divorced.  Justina's business is selling fruit and vegetables.  She also has a business renting out crockery.  She is requesting this loan to set up a small restaurant (or, failing that, she will buy a machine).  What is certain is that Justina would really like to expand her business.

When we asked Justina what she likes about Pro Mujer, she replied that she likes sharing with the ladies in her group.

loans.use: To open a small restaurant

loans.name: Luís Alberto

texts.es:
Luís Alberto Q. C. tiene 27 años, Es casado, vive con la  compañera   y con los hijos, vive en el cantón de Ventanas Provincia los Ríos. Tiene 2 hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. SEÑOR DE LA SALUD  se encuentra ubicada  en el recinto Soloma, perteneciente al Cantón Echeandia, esta ventanilla se dedica a lobores Agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz, maracuyá esta actividad llevan mucho tiempo haciéndolo.

Luís Alberto se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz, maracuyá . Compra sus productos en el Comercial Viscarra y vende los  productos en el Comercial Escudero.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos agrícolas y fertilizantes para el cultivo de maíz y arroz, maracuyá. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentan desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es comprar un terreno.

Le gusta el deporte.
texts.en: Luís Alberto Q. C. is 27. He is married and lives with his wife and children in the Ventanas Provincia los Rios canton. He has 2 children. The members of the V.R.C. SEÑOR DE LA SALUD  are located in the Soloma region, belonging to the Echeandia Canton. This region is dedicated to short-cycle agricultural labour; the sowing of corn, rice, and passion fruit. They spend a lot of time doing this. Luís Alberto works in agriculture, sowing corn, rice and passion fruit. He purchases his products in the Viscarra Market and sells them in the Escudero Market. He is requesting this loan for the purchase of agricultural inputs and fertilizers for the cultivation of corn, rice and passion fruit. With the support of this loan the institution will help him economically to supply his needs. He has to overcome challenges such as plagues and diseases and the varied climate. His dream is to purchase a plot of land. He likes sports.

loans.use: agricultural inputs and fertilizers

texts.en:
Luis Armando C. C. is 25 years old and lives with his wife and their two children. They live in the town of Ventenas Provincia los Rios.  

The Señor de la Salud group is located Soloma and is part of the Echandia municipality. This community bank focuses on the agricultural sector specifically the cultivation of short cycle crops like corn, rice, and passion fruit. The group has been working in this area for a long time.  

Luis Armando is a farmer and works growing corn, rice, and passion fruit. He purchases his supplies in Comercial Viscarra, a large store, and he sells his products in Comercial Escudero.

He is applying for the loan to buy agricultural supplies and fertilizer to cultivate corn, rice, and passion fruit. The loan will provide economic support that will allow him to fulfill his family's needs. He faces challenges like insect infestations, plant diseases, and unpredictable weather. His dream is to purchase a plot of land. Luis Armando enjoys playing sports in his free time.

loans.use: Purchase of agricultural supplies and fertilizers

Lida is 40 years old, married, and lives with her husband and their children. She lives in Ventanas canton, Los Ríos province.  She has 5 children.

The members of the “Señor de la Salud” (Lord of Health) Communal Bank are located in the Saloma area of Echeandia canton. The bank is dedicated to agricultural laborers on the short crop cycle, who sow corn, rice, and passion fruit. They have been doing this for a long time.

Lida is dedicated to agriculture, sowing corn, rice, and passion fruit. She buys her products at Comercial Viscarra and sells the products in Comercial Escudero. Lida is requesting a loan to buy agricultural supplies and fertilizers for cultivating corn, rice, and passion fruit. The loan will help her economically to supply her necessities. She confronts challenges such as plant plagues and diseases as well as climate variations.

Her dream is to buy more agricultural land.  She loves music.

loans.use: TO BUY AGRICULTURAL SUPPLIES AND FERTILIZERS FOR HER CROPS

loans.name: Elvia Leonor

texts.es:
Elvia Leonor C. P. tiene 21 años de edad, Es soltera, vive con la madre en  el Cantón Ventanas en la  Provincia de los Ríos.  No tiene  hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. SEÑOR DE LA SALUD  se encuentra ubicada  en el recinto Soloma, perteneciente al Cantón Echeandia, esta ventanilla se dedica a lobores Agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz, maracuyá esta actividad llevan mucho tiempo haciéndolo.

Elvia Leonor C. P. is 21 years old and single.  She lives with her mother in the Venantas canton in the Los Ríos province.  She does not have children.

The members of the Señor de la Salud Communal Bank are located in the Soloma area in the Echeandia canton.  The members of this communal bank dedicate themselves to growing short cycle corn, rice, and passion fruit.  They have been doing this for a long time.

Elvia Leonor grows corn, rice, and passion fruit.  She buys her products at the Comercial Viscarra, and she sells her products at the Comercial Escudero.

She is requesting the loan to buy agricultural supplies and fertilizers for her corn, rice, and passion fruit crops.  The support from the loan will help her financially in order to supply the necessities.  The crops face challenges like pest infestation, diseases, and climate changes.

Her dream is to buy a piece of land.

She likes music.

loans.use: Agricultural supplies and fertilizers

loans.name: Pedro Alejandrino

Pedro Alejandrino C. P. tiene 52 años, Es casado, vive con la esposa  y con los hijos,  vive en el cantón de Ventanas Provincia los Ríos. Tiene 3 hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. SEÑOR DE LA SALUD  se encuentra ubicada  en el recinto Soloma, perteneciente al Cantón Echeandia, esta ventanilla se dedica a lobores Agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz, maracuyá esta actividad llevan mucho tiempo haciéndolo.

Pedro Alejandrino se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz, maracuyá. Compra sus productos en el Comercial Viscarra y vende los  productos en el Comercial Escudero.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos agrícolas y fertilizantes para el cultivo de maíz y arroz, maracuyá. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentan desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es comprar un terreno.

Le gusta el deporte.
texts.en:
Pedro Alejandrino C. P., 52, is married living with his wife and children in Ventanas canton, Los Ríos province.  He has 3 children.

The “SEÑOR DE LA SALUD” (Lord of Health) communal bank is located in Soloma which is part of Echeandia canton.  The bank’s members are mostly short cycle corn, rice and passion fruit farmers.  They have been in this line of work for a long time.

Pedro Alejandrino is a corn, rice and passion fruit farmer.  He buys his products at Comercial Viscarra and sells them at Comercial Ecudero.

He is asking for funds to buy farming supplies and fertilizers for his corn, rice and passion fruit crops.  Support from the loan will help him meet his economic needs.  They face challenges like infestations, illnesses and climactic variations.  His dream is to buy a lot.

He enjoys sports.

loans.use: For farming supplies and fertilizers.

loans.name: Irene

texts.en:
Irene G. is from the town of Maribojoc. She is 40 years old. Irene is married and has children who go to school. To make a living, Irene owns & operates a business venture in the agriculture sector raising crops. While not the only means for generating revenue, the main source of income for the business comes from planting and harvesting cassava for sale. Irene dreams of having her children finish college and have bright futures.

Irene joined CEVI to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Irene has successfully repaid a previous loan  from CEVI. Irene is requesting a new loan of 8000 PHP which will be used to purchase fertilizers such as manure. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve her business.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers such as manure

loans.name: Marita

texts.en:
Marita O., 35 years old, is from the town of Maribojoc. She is married and has four children, aged 13, 11, 9 and 2. Marita's business is making detergent soap and dishwashing liquid. She first sold her products to friends and now sells to more people in her community. Marita works hard to build her business. She hopes to have more customers.

Marita joined CEVI to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Marita is requesting a new loan of 4,000 Philippines pesos (PHP), which will be used to purchase materials and other supplies. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: To purchase materials and other supplies

loans.name: Agripina

texts.en:
Agripina A. is from the town of Sikatuna. She is 47 years old. Agripina is married and has three children. To make a living, Agripina runs a general store. The main source of income for the business comes from selling a variety of different products in the local community. Agripina also plants and harvests vegetables in her backyard. 

Agripina joined CEVI to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Agripina has successfully repaid a previous loan from CEVI. Agripina is requesting a new loan of 15,000 Philippines pesos (PHP), which will be used to buy fertilizers and additional merchandise to sell.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers and additional merchandise to sell

loans.name: Arlene

texts.en:
40-year-old Arlene B. is from the town of Sikatuna. She is married and has a 16-year-old child. To make a living, Arlene owns & operates a general store selling both food & daily use products in the local community. Arlene also has a small piggery in her backyard. She grows the pigs for fattening and sale.

Arlene joined CEVI to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Arlene has successfully repaid a previous loan from CEVI. Arlene is requesting a new loan of 10,000 PHP, which will be used to buy feed, piglets and additional merchandise to sell. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to pay for her child's tuition fee.

loans.use: To buy feed, piglets and additional merchandise to sell

loans.name: Diega

texts.en:
Diega M. is from the town of Sikatuna. She is 59 years old. Diega is single. To make a living, Diega raises pigs for fattening and sale. Diega does her best to maintain her business.

Diega joined CEVI to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Diega has successfully repaid a previous loan from CEVI. 

Diega is requesting a new loan of 18,000 Philippines pesos (PHP), which will be used to buy piglets and feeds. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve her business.

loans.use: To buy piglets and feeds

loans.name: Esmeralda

texts.en:
51-year-old Esmeralda V. is from the town of Sikatuna.  She owns and manages a sari-sari store where she sells canned goods and other kinds of products.  She also grows pigs and chickens in her backyard.  Esmeralda helps her family financially.  She hopes for her businesses to be stable.

Esmeralda joined CEVI to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Esmeralda has successfully repaid a previous loan from CEVI.  Esmeralda is requesting a new loan of 18,000 PHP which will be used to purchase food and additional merchandise to sell.  She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve her family's living condition.

loans.use: To purchase food and additional merchandise to sell.

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
Jocelyn O. is from the town of Sikatuna.  She is 33 years old. Jocelyn is married and has 4 children ages 13, 9, 8 and 2.  To make a living, Jocelyn owns and operates a specialized retail store.  While not the only means for generating revenue, the main source of income for the business comes primarily from selling mobile phone credit loads in the local community.  Jocelyn also started selling more products like sugar and coffee.  She hopes to acquire more products to sell.

Jocelyn joined CEVI to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Jocelyn has successfully repaid a previous loan from CEVI.  Jocelyn is requesting a new loan of 12,000 PHP which will be used to invest in expanding the business.

loans.use: To invest in expanding the business

loans.name: Luisa

While not the only means for generating revenue, the main source of income for the business comes primarily from selling both food and daily use products in the local community.  Luisa wishes to have a successful business.

Luisa joined CEVI to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities.  Luisa has successfully repaid a previous loan from CEVI.  Luisa is requesting a new loan of 15,000 PHP which will be used to purchase additional products to sell.  She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to expand her business.

loans.use: To purchase additional products to sell.

While not the only means for generating revenue, the main source of income for the business comes primarily from selling a variety of different products in the local community. Osita joined CEVI to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities.  Osita has successfully repaid a previous loan from CEVI. loans.use: To buy piglets and additional merchandise to sell.

loans.name: Imelda

texts.en:
Imelda V. is 43-years old married woman who supports her family by operating a: sari-sari (general) store business.  She lives in Sagay City, Negros Occidental.  She has been a member of NWTF-Project Dungganon since 1996 and has improved her living conditions with the help of her loans from NWTF and through her own efforts. 

By working hard in her  sari-sari (general) store business, she is gradually making her family more economically stable.  She now earns an average monthly income of 5,600 PHP.  Imelda is now borrowing 19,500 PHP so that she can purchase more stock to sell.  This will be her 14th loan from NWTF-Project Dungganon.  Her previous loan of 19,000 PHP, which she paid off well within its term was just another step in her journey toward economic freedom.  Imelda aspires to improve her family's living conditions and ensure their future well being by following the Dungganon way.
 
About NWTF: 

In a world full of challenges, Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation (NWTF), is making a difference in the lives of thousands of women through Project Dungganon (a Hiligaynon word that means Honorable). Through the alleviation program, NWTF is empowering these women to progress from earning less than $1 a day to achieving realities that surpass even their dreams. They have taken a life path that will ultimately make them Dungganon - a title of esteem that is bestowed to a member of a community who has earned the respect through a lifetime of hard and honest work. 

Help NWTF continue its mission to help the poorest in the Philippines by clicking  the link to the   NWTF Kiva lending team  on Kiva.org to join our team.

loans.use: To purchase more stock to sell.

loans.name: Lecil

texts.en:
Lecil B. is a married woman who lives in the town of Basay, Negros Oriental.  She earns her living by operating 2 business ventures: a variety store and a food vending businesses.  Her husband Albert, who is 35 years old, works as a farmer to earn his living and also helps in his wife's business activities.  They have two children who are 9 and 10 years old. 

Lecil joined NWTF-Project Dungganon in 2008 because she aspired for something better for her family.  With the help of her past 4 loans from NWTF-Project Dungganon, Lecil has been incrementally lifting her family out of poverty by the sweat of her brow.  Her previous loan of 10,000 PHP helped her earn a monthly profit of 6,000 PHP,  increasing the family's standard of living.  This time, for her 5th cycle loan, she is borrowing 15,000 PHP, which she intends to use to buy stock for the variety store so that she could continue to save up for the future education of her children.  Lecil B. is a Dungganon woman who is following an honorable path toward the achievement of her dreams.

loans.name: Dorotia

texts.en:
Dorotia D. is a married woman who lives in Prk. Antipolo, Brgy.Linao, Talisay City, Cebu. She earns her living by operating two businesses. She is a tailor who makes curtains, pillow cases, and bedsheets. She also owns a motorcycle taxi business. Her husband, Cresoncio D., works as a motorcycle driver to earn his living. They have five children between the ages of 9 and 23. One is married, and the other four are currently going to school. 

Dorotia joined NWTF-Project Dungganon in 2005 because she aspired for something better for her family. With the help of her past 11 loans from NWTF-Project Dungganon, Dorotia has been incrementally lifting her family out of poverty by the sweat of her brow. Her previous loan of PHP 29,500 helped her increase her monthly income to PHP 36,000, improving the family's standard of living. This time, for her twelfth loan, she is borrowing PHP 49,500, which she intends to use to purchase more material to sew. Her goal is to continue to save and buy land for her family. Dorotia D. is a Dungganon woman who is following an honorable path toward the achievement of her dreams.
