In a world full of challenges, Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation (NWTF) is making a difference in the lives of thousands of women through Project Dungganon (a Hiligaynon word that means Honorable). Through the alleviation program, NWTF is empowering these women to progress from earning less than $1 a day to achieving realities that surpass even their dreams. They have taken a life path that will ultimately make them Dungganon - a title of esteem that is bestowed to a member of a community who has earned the respect through a lifetime of hard and honest work. Help NWTF continue its mission to help the poorest in the Philippines by clicking the link to the NWTF Kiva lending team on Kiva.org to join our team.

loans.use: To purchase material

loans.name: Thelma

texts.en:
Thelma C. is a widow who lives in Brgy. Cabagnaan, La Castellana, Negros Occidental. She earns her living by operating a general store. Thelma joined NWTF-Project Dungganon in 2001 because she aspired for something better for her family. With the help of her past 16 loans from NWTF-Project Dungganon, Thelma has been incrementally lifting her family out of poverty by the sweat of her brow. Her previous loan of 20,000 PHP helped her to earn a monthly profit of 6,000 PHP, raising her family's standard of living. This time, for her 17th cycle loan, she is borrowing 20,000 PHP with which she intends to buy stocks of goods and soft drinks for her general store so that she can continue to save up for the improvement of business. Thelma C. is a Dungganon woman who is following an honorable path toward the achievement of her dreams. 

About NWTF: In a world full of challenges, Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation (NWTF) is making a difference in the lives of thousands of women through Project Dungganon (a Hiligaynon word that means honorable). Through the alleviation program, NWTF is empowering these women to progress from earning less than $1 a day to achieving realities that surpass even their dreams. They have taken a life path that will ultimately make them Dungganon - a title of esteem that is bestowed to a member of a community who has earned respect through a lifetime of hard and honest work. Help NWTF continue its mission to help the poorest in the Philippines by clicking the link to the NWTF Kiva lending team on Kiva.org to join our team.

loans.use: To purchase more stocks of soft drinks for resale.

loans.name: Emilio

texts.es: Emilio, de 41 años, es un hombre muy sencillo y trabajador, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposa Marlene de 35 años y sus 2 queridos hijos Luis de 13 y Michael de 7 años, quienes son el principal motivo de todos sus esfuerzos. La actividad a la que Emilio se dedica, es el cultivo de papa y arvejas, Todos los días, muy temprano por la mañana, trabaja en su cultivo, ya que sabe que mientras mejor calidad tengan sus productos, mejores precios obtendrá por sus productos en el mercado mayorista de Tarma. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cosechar sus tierras, ya que así siente que los meses de trabajo han tenido sus frutos, lleva 23 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es fumigar sus tierras, puesto que siempre hay el peligro de que los químicos le causen alguna enfermedad. Con el tiempo, desea comprar más tierras, para sembrar más. Este es el primer crédito con MFP, manifiesta que el dinero del crédito le ayudara mucho en el progreso de su trabajo. En su banco comunal, es un socio muy responsable y respetuoso. Con los mil nuevos soles solicitados, comprará semillas de papa y alverja, ya que en esta temporada son los productos que mejor se venderán.
texts.en: Emilio, 41, is a humble and hard-working man who lives in his own home with his wife, Marlene, 35, and his 2 dear sons, Luis, 13 and Michael, 7.  They are the main reasons that he works so hard.  He is a farmer and he grows potatoes and beans.  Every day he works in the fields from very early in the morning.  He knows that the better quality his crops are, the better prices he will receive in the wholesale market in Tarma.  What he likes most about his work is harvesting his crops since that is when he feels that the months of work show their results.  He has been a farmer for 23 years and what he finds most difficult is fumigating the land since there is always the danger that the chemicals will cause some type of illness.  In the future he wants to buy more land so that he can plant more.  This is his first loan with MFP.  He has shown that the money will help him with the progress of his work.  In his communal bank he is a very responsible and respectful member.  With the 1900 soles that he is requesting, he will buy potato and bean seeds since this is the season when these crops will best sell.

loans.use: To buy potato and bean seeds

loans.name: Jesus

texts.es: Jesús, de 51 años, es un hombre muy sencillo y trabajador, vive en su casa propia y lo que más desea es mejorar su calidad vida. El persistente trabajo de Jesús poco a poco va dando frutos, el restaurante que con tanto esfuerzo a puesto cada día tiene más clientes. Y es que su restaurante, es uno de los lugares más concurridos, debido a la gran atención que brinda, pero sobre todo a la deliciosa sazón que tienen sus comidas. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es atender a sus clientes, ya que el es el administrador del restaurante, lleva 10 años en este negocio y considera que lo más difícil es satisfacer a sus clientes y brindarles un buen servicio, ya que las personas son muy exigentes, aun así sabe que ese es su trabajo y que tiene que cumplirlo, espera que con el tiempo su restaurante crezca y se convierta en uno de los más conocidos de la ciudad. Es el octavo crédito con MFP, sabe que tiene que pagarlo a tiempo, puesto que no quiere causarle problemas a las socias de su banco comunal. Con los quinientos nuevos soles solicitados, comprará nuevas sillas y mesas para mejorar el ambiente de su restaurante.
texts.en:
Jesús is 51 years old and is a simple hard working man.  He lives in his own home and has a great desire to improve his quality of life.  Jesús’ persistence has, little by little, given rise to his restaurant and each day he gets more customers.  His restaurant is one of the busiest because of the service he gives, but above all because of the seasoning his food has.  What he enjoys most is servicing his customers, since he is the manager.  He’s been doing this for 10 years and what he considers to be the greatest challenge is satisfying his customers and giving them good service, because they are very demanding.  Never the less, he knows that this is his job and he has to do it.  He hopes that his restaurant will grow in time and that it will become one of the best known in the city.

This will be his eighth loan thorough MFP and he knows that he must repay in on schedule because he does not want to cause problems for his associates at the communal bank.  He will use the 500 PEN ($200) to buy new tables and chairs to improve the ambiance in his restaurant.

loans.use: Tables and chairs

loans.name: Jorge

texts.es: Jorge, de 60 años, es un hombre muy amable y trabajador, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposa Ana de 52 años y sus 2 hijos menores Luis de 19 e Isabel de 11 años, a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. El cultivo de café, plátano y yuca es la actividad a la que se dedica Jorge, todos los días desde muy temprano sale a trabajar a sus chacras, con el único fin de esforzarse mucho para que sus cultivos tengan muy buena calidad. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cultivar sus tierras, lleva 15 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es fumigar sus tierras, ya que los químicos son muy peligrosos para su salud. Con el tiempo, espera sembrar más así tener una mejor producción. Este es el primer crédito con MFP, sabe que tiene que pagar todas sus cuotas puntualmente, si quiere acceder a otro préstamo, en su banco comunal es un socio muy cumplido y activo. Con los quinientos nuevos soles solicitados, comprará más plantas de café, para ampliar sus actuales sembríos.
texts.en:
Jorge is 60 years old.  He is a kind and hard-working man who lives in his own home with his wife, 52 year-old Ana, and his two dependent children, 19 year-old Luis and 11 year-old Isabel, for whom he would like to provide a better quality of life.

Jorge grows coffee, bananas and cassava.  Every day, very early in the morning, he goes out to work on his farm with the goal of working hard so that he grows good-quality crops.  What he most likes about his work is cultivating his land.  He has been in this business for 15 years and considers the most difficult part of his work to be spraying his land since the chemicals are very dangerous for his health.

Over time, Jorge hopes to grow more and improve his production.  This is his first loan with MFP.  He knows that he must make his repayments punctually if he wants to have access to another loan.  He is a very punctual and active member of his community bank.  He will use the 500 Peruvian soles he is requesting to buy more coffee plants so that he can expand his current crops.

loans.use: To buy coffee plants

loans.name: Juan

texts.es: Juan, de 40 años, es un hombre muy amable y sencillo, vive en su casa propia junto a su querida hija Mayra de 17 años, quien es el motivo de todos sus esfuerzos. Desde muy joven Juan se dedicó al cultivo del café, achiote y plátano, ya que esta es la actividad que ha realizado en su familia desde hace mucha generaciones, sus productos los vende a los compradores, que llegan hasta sus chacras, quienes posteriormente llevan el producto a vender a la ciudad de Lima. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cultivar sus tierras y lo hace con mucho esmero, lleva 17 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es fumigar sus sembríos. Con el tiempo, desea comprar más tierras para poder incrementar su producción. Este es el primer crédito con MFP, sabe que tiene que pagar sus cuotas a tiempo y esta dispuesto a hacerlo, en su banco comunal es muy respetuoso con el resto de sus socias. Con los quinientos nuevos soles solicitados, comprará más abono y fertilizantes para sus tierras.
texts.en:
Juan. 40, is a very kind, unassuming man living in his own house with his beloved daughter Mayra, 17, who is the motivating force behind all his efforts.  From a very young age Juan has farmed coffee, achiote and banana since this was the activity his family has been engaged in for many generations.  He sells his production to buyers that come to his fields and who later take the product to sell in the city of Lima.

What he enjoys most about the work is cultivating the land, something he does with much dedication.  He’s been in this line of work for 17 years and considers the most difficult part to be fumigating the crops.  In time, he’d like to buy more farmland to increase production.

This is his first loan with MFP.  He knows that he must repay on time and is willing to do so.  He is very respectful towards his fellow group members in the communal bank.

He will use the 500 new sol loan to buy more manure and fertilizers for his land.

loans.use: To buy sacks of manure and fertilizers.

loans.name: Kely

texts.es: Kely, de 24 años, es una mujer muy sencilla y amable, vive en su casa propia junto a su querido hijo James de 1 años, a quien desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. La tienda de abarrotes de kely es una de las más visitadas en su barrio, desde muy temprano por la mañana abre su tienda en espera de que sus clientes lleguen a comprar las cosas que necesitan. Ella es una vendedora muy alegre y atenta, ya que siempre recibe a sus clientes con una sonrisa y está dispuesta ayudarlos en sus compras. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es conversar con sus clientes, lleva 2 años en este negocio y considera que lo más difícil es tener que permanecer todo el día dentro de su tienda sin poder salir. Con el tiempo, espera poder hacer ampliar su tienda y llenarla de más mercadería, para poder ofrecer a sus clientes una mejor variedad de productos. Es el primer crédito con MFP y está dispuesta a pagar todas sus cuotas a tiempo, ya que no quiere causarle problemas a su banco comunal, donde es muy querida por el resto de sus socias. Con los trescientos nuevos soles solicitados, comprará más productos, para implementar mejor su tienda de abarrotes.
texts.en:
Kely is 24 years old.  She is a very modest and kind woman who lives in her own home with her beloved son James who is one year old and who she would like to provide with a better quality of life.  Kely's grocery store is one of the most popular in her neighborhood.  She opens her store very early in the morning ready for her customers who come to buy the things they need.  Kely is a very happy and attentive shopkeeper who always greets her customers with a smile and is ready to help them with their purchases.

What Kely most likes about her work is chatting to her customers.  She has been in this business for two years and she considers the most difficult part of her work to be having to stay in her store all day without being able to go out.  Over time, she hopes to expand her store and fill it with more merchandise so that she can offer her customers a better variety of products.

This is Kely's first loan with MFP and she is ready to make her repayments on time because she does not want to cause problems for her community bank where she is very well liked by the other members.  Kely will use her 300 Peruvian soles to buy more products to better stock her grocery store.

loans.use: To buy more products to better stock her grocery store

loans.name: Roel

texts.es: Roel, de 30 años es un hombre muy sincero y trabajador, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposa Elizabeth de 28 años y sus 3 queridos hijos, a quienes desea brindar un mejor futuro. Con muchas ganas de trabajar Roel sale todos los días a cultivar sus tierras, él tiene  principalmente sembríos de café, achiote y plátano, productos que son rápidamente comprados en el mercado de la ciudad de Pichanaki, debido a la buena calidad que tienen. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cultivar sus tierras, lleva 7 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es fumigar sus tierras, ya que los químicos son muy peligrosos. Para más adelante, espera que su producción mejore, ya que de eso dependen sus ingresos. Este es el primer crédito con MFP, esta muy feliz de haberlo obtenido y esta dispuesto a pagar todas sus cuotas puntualmente, en su banco comunal es muy querido. Con los quinientos nuevos soles solicitados, comprará más abono para sus chacras, ya que desea que produzcan más.
texts.en:
Roel is 30 years old.  He is a very modest and hard-working man who lives in his own home with his wife, 28 year-old Elizabeth, and his three beloved children for whom he would like to provide a better future.

With a great desire to work, Roel goes out every day to cultivate his land.  He mainly grows coffee, annatto and bananas.  These products sell quickly in Pichanaki city market owing to their good quality.  What Roel likes most about his work is cultivating his land.  He has been in this business for 7 years and he considers the most difficult part of his work to be spraying his land since the chemicals are very dangerous.  In the future, he hopes that his production will improve since he depends on this for his income.

This is Roel's first loan with MFP.  He is very happy to have received it and he is ready to make his repayments on time.  He is a very well-liked member of his community bank.  Roel will use the 500 Peruvian soles he has requested to buy more manure for his farm since he would like them to be more productive.

loans.use: To buy more sacks of manure

loans.name: Aquelina

texts.es: Aquelina, D. 62 años, es una mujer que siempre a luchado por sobresalir en la vida, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo Epifanio D. 60 años y su querido hijo Gilmer D. 27 años, a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad D. vida. Trabajando arduamente Aquelina a logrado sacar adelante sus sembríos, todas las mañana se levanta muy temprano para regar y brindarle el cuidado respectivo a su papa y alverja los cuales posteriormente venderá en la ciudad D. Tarma, ya que es ahí donD. obtiene los mejores precios por sus productos. Lo que más le gusta D. su trabajo es que pueD. disfrutar D. la libertad D. laborar en sus campos. Lleva 20 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es tener que trabajar la tierra. Con el tiempo, espera poder adecuar sus tierras para plantar mucho más arveja. Este es el primer crédito con MFP, sabe que este préstamo le ayudará bastante en el progreso y desarrollo D. su negocio, es por eso que esta dispuesta a pagar todas sus cuotas puntualmente, en su banco comunal es una socia muy responsable, motivo por el cual es muy querida. Con los quinientos nuevos soles solicitados, comprará más abono y fertilizantes, para mejorar la calidad D. sus tierras.
texts.en:
Aquelina, 62, is a woman who has always struggled to get ahead in life.  She lives in her own house with her husband, Epifanio, 60, and her beloved son, Gilmer, 27, for whom she wants to proviD. a better quality of life.

Working hard Aquelina has managed to grow her crops.  Every morning she gets up very early to water and proviD. proper care for the potato and pea crops that she will subsequently sell in the city of Tarma since that’s where she gets the best prices for her products.

What she enjoys the most about her work is that she can enjoy the freedom of working out in the fields.  She has been farming for 20 years and considers tilling the land to be the most difficult part.  In time she’d like to make the fields adequate for more pea planting.

This is her first loan with MFP.  She knows that the loan will help quite a bit to develop her business’ progress so she is willing to repay all her installments on time.  She is a very responsible member of her communal bank which makes her very well liked.

She will use the requested 500 new soles to buy more manure and fertilizers to improve the quality of her farmland.

loans.use: To buy sacks of manure and fertilizers.

loans.name: Reyna

texts.es: Reyna, de 27 años, es una joven madre de familia muy amorosa y trabajadora, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo Amalio de 37 años y su querido hijo Brandon de 6 años a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. Con mucho esfuerzo Reyna ha logrado trabajar sus tierras y volverlas muy productivas, ella cultiva papa y arveja, los cuales luego lleva a vender hasta la ciudad de Tarma, donde los vende al por mayor. Sus cultivos le han dado los ingresos necesarios para mantenerse, es por eso que desea poner todas sus ganas en sacar adelante este negocio. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cuidar sus cultivos, lleva 8 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es transportar sus productos, ya que los sacos que lleva son muy pesados y la cansan mucho. Para más adelante, desea comprar nuevas tierras, para ampliar su producción. Este es el sexto crédito con MFP, ha sido muy puntual en sus anteriores créditos y espera serlo también ahora. En su banco comunal es una socia muy participativa y siempre esta al tanto de los acuerdos a los que llegan en su grupo. Con los quinientos nuevos soles solicitados, comprará más sacos de abono e insecticidas, con lo cual espera mejorar sus cultivos.
texts.en:
Reyna, 27, is a young, loving, hard working mother living in her own house with her husband, Amalio, 37, and her beloved son, Brandon, 6, for whom she wants to provide a better quality of life.

With much effort Reyna has managed to work her land and make it productive.  She grows potatoes and peas which she then takes to sell in the city of Tarma where she sells them at wholesale. Her crops have provided income needed to support herself and this is why she wants to put in all her efforts to have the business succeed.

What she most likes about the work is caring for the crops.  She’s been farming for 8 years and considers the most difficult part having to transport her products because the sacks she carries are very heavy and they tire her out a lot.  For later on she wants to buy new fields to expand production.

This is her 6th loan with MFP.  She has been very punctual with her previous loans and expects to be so again now.  She is a very participatory member of her communal bank and is always aware of the group agreements.

She will use the requested 500 new soles to buy more sacks of manure and insecticides which she hopes will improve her crops.

loans.use: To buy sacks of manure and insecticides to eliminate the insect infestation.

loans.name: Wilmer

texts.es: Wilmer, de 30 años, convive con Aidé, de 29 años. Ambos tienen 3 hijos: Alexander, de 10, Lesly, de 9 y July, de 5 años de edad. En unión familiar ellos viven en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Unión Palomar (selva central peruana). La siembra de café, plátanos y palta, son los principales sembríos de Wilmer, los cuales fertiliza, cuida y cultiva constantemente, en su hectárea de terreno agrícola. Ya tiene 10 años dedicándose a la agricultura, y lo que más le gusta a él, es poder solucionar los constantes problemas que se presentan en el periodo del sembrío, según recuerda que hace algún tiempo la maleza que crecía entre sus cultivos afectaron el crecimiento de sus sembríos. Por ello, Wilmer, ya comenzó a hacer viveros de café, comenzando con 3 mil plantas; con ello piensa renovar sus plantaciones, de esa manera tener plantas nuevas y fuertes posteriormente. Esta es la primera vez que tiene un crédito con MFP, y espera adquirir nuevas experiencias y nuevos éxitos con el trabajo conjunto que realizará en está nueva constitución de su banco comunal. Con el crédito que espera recibirá, planea comprar varios sacos de abono orgánico, los cuales esparcirá en sus diferentes sembríos.
texts.en:
Wilmer, 30, lives with Aidé, 29.  They have three children together:  Alexander, 10, Lesly, 9 and July, 5. They live together as a family in their own house located in Unión Palomar (Peruvian central jungle).  Wilmer’s main crops are coffee, bananas and avocado which he fertilizes, cares for and constantly cultivates on his hectare of farmland.  

He has been farming for 10 years now and what he likes best is being able to solve the constant problems that arise during the growing cycle.  As he remembers, a time ago the weeds growing among his plants affected their growth.  Because of this, Wilmer has started up coffee nurseries, starting with 3000 plants.  He plans to renew his plantations this way thus having new, strong plants later on.

This is the first time he’s had a loan with MFP and he hopes to acquire new experiences and new successes with the joint work he’s starting in his communal bank.

He will use the loan he’ll receive to buy several sacks of organic manure to spread among his different crops.

loans.use: To buy several sacks of manure.

loans.name: Rita

texts.es: Rita, de 59 años, enviudo hace 22 años, con mucho coraje y trabajo cuido de sus 5 hijos; pero ahora solo vive con uno de ellos, Cristian, de 28 años de edad, en su casa propia ubicada en la localidad de Unión Palomar (selva central peruana). En sus más de 2 hectáreas de terrenos agrícolas, está luchadora mujer siembra palta, café y plátanos; ya tiene 25 años dedicándose a la agricultura, su amplia experiencia le ayudó a comercializar sus cosechas a muy buen precio; tanto así que los intermediarios mayoristas van a su propio terreno agrícola. Rita menciona que en campañas de cosecha, que oscilan entre el mes de diciembre al mes de Junio, donde vende un promedio de 1200 bateas de palta. Para el futuro ella desea mejorar la calidad de sus plantaciones y por ende dinamizar sus ganancias. Esta es la primera vez que tiene un crédito con MFP, y espera salir adelante en compañía de los integrantes de su nuevo banco comunal. Con el crédito que recibirá, planea comprar varios sacos de abono orgánico, los cuales esparcirá en sus diferentes cultivos.
texts.en: 59-year-old Rita, widowed for 22 years, takes care of her 5 children with a lot of courage and work. Now only one of them (Christian, 28) lives with her in her own house located in the town of Unión Palomar (central Peruvian jungle). In her more than 2 hectares of agricultural land, this fighting woman sows avocados, coffee and bananas. She has worked in agriculture for 25 years, and her ample experience helped her to sell her harvests for a very good price. So much so that the wholesale intermediaries come to her own agricultural land. Rita mentions that in harvest seasons, that oscilte between the month of December and the month of June, she sells an average of 1200 trays of avocados. For the future, she wishes to improve the quality of her plantations and thus boost her profits. This is the first time that she is taking a loan with MFP, and she hopes to get ahead in the company of the members of her new communal bank. With the loan that she will receive, she plans to buy several sacks of organic fertilizer, which she will scatter among her different crops.

loans.use: To buy several sacks of fertilizer

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.es: Herlinda, de 55 años, está casada con Jesús, de 63 años. Ambos tienen 9 hijos, pero solo viven con 2 de ellos: Eden, de 18 y César, de 15 años. En unión familiar ellos viven en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Unión Palomar (selva central peruana). Está pareja de esposos, a pesar de su avanzada edad, siguen unidos, y sobre todo trabajando mucho, para sacar a delante a sus dos últimos hijos. Hace 15 años que se dedican a la agricultura, sus principales cultivos constan de café, palta y plátanos. Herlinda nos cuenta que ambos coordinan para poder vender sus sembríos, mientras que ella lleva a vender al mercado central de La Merced, los plátanos que cada 15 días cosecha, su esposo Jesús, comercializa, su grano de café en la cooperativa de Alto Palomar. Todo el esfuerzo que realizaron en estos años, lograron que ahora obtengan más de 3 hectáreas de terrenos agrícolas, en los que planean incrementar la calidad y cantidad de sus cultivos. Esta es la primera vez que tiene un crédito con MFP, y espera lograr sus objetivos con el apoyo de los que integran está nueva asociación. Con el crédito que recibirá, planea comprar varios sacos de abono orgánico, los que esparcirá en sus viveros de café.
texts.en: 55-year-old Herlinda is married to 63-year-old Jesús. These two have 9 children, but only two of them live with them: Eden (18) and César (15). In family union, they live in their own home, located in the town of Unión Palomar (central Peruvian jungle).  This married couple, despite their advanced age, continues together and, above all, works a lot in order to help their two last children get ahead. They have worked in agriculture for the last 15 years. Their principal crops consist of coffee, avocados and bananas. Herlinda tells us that they both coordinate to be able to sell their crops; while she goes to sell the bananas (which they harvest every 15 days) at the central market La Merced, her husband Jesús sells their coffee beans in the Alto Palomar cooperative. Through all the effort they put in these years, they have succeeded in obtaining more than 3 hectares of land for agriculture, in which they plan on increasing the quality and quantity of their crops. This is the first time that Herlinda is taking a loan with MFP, and she hopes to achieve her goals with the support of the members of this new association. With the loan that she will receive, she plans to buy several sacks of organic fertilizer that she will spread over her coffee nursery.

loans.use: To buy sacks of fertilizer for her coffee plantation

loans.name: Jhans

texts.es: Jhans, de 24 años, es un hombre soltero y trabajador, que hace poco se independizo, pues ya alquilo un cuarto propio en la localidad de Unión Palomar (selva central peruana), donde vive. Esté joven y emprendedor hombre siembra plátanos en una hectárea, mientras que en la otra hectárea siembra un poco de café. Según cuenta cada 15 días cosecha plátanos, ya tiene un año dedicándose a la agricultura, y asegura que gracias a Dios pudo vender a muy buen precio sus cultivos; pues los vendedores de la cooperativa de Sanchirio, reconocen el buen grano de café, que heredó de su papá Luis, de 45 años; pero sigue mejorando sus cultivos con la ayuda de su hermano Edwin, quien es su socio. Por todo lo que aprendió en está temporada, Jhans, desea ampliar sus platanales, replantando mamomes (bolsas de plátanos). Esta es la primera vez que tiene un crédito con MFP, y espera salir adelante en compañía de su banco comunal, que son personas responsables. Con el crédito que solicita, planea comprar 5 sacos de abono orgánico, los cuales utilizará en próxima renovación.
texts.en: 24-year-old Jhans is a single, working man, that recently moved out of his parents’ home and rented his own room in the town of Unión Palomar (central Peruvian jungle), where he lives. This young entrepreneur sows plantains on one hectare of land, and a little coffee on the other hectare. According to Jhans, he harvests plantains every 15 days. He has been working in agriculture for a year already and he assures that, thanks to God, he was able to sell his crops for a very good price, since the sellers of the Sanchirio cooperative recognize the good coffee bean that he inherited from his father Luis (45). However, he continues to improve his crops with the help of his brother Edwin, who is his partner. Because of all that he learned over this period, Jhans wishes to increase his plantain plantations, replanting “mamomes” (plantain bags). This is the first time that he is taking a loan with MFP, and he hopes to get ahead in the company of his communal bank, which is made up of responsible people. With the loan that he is requesting, he plans to buy 5 sacks of organic fertilizer, which he will use in his next renovation.

loans.use: To buy 5 sacks of fertilizer

loans.name: Aurelio

texts.es: Aurelio, de 41 años, está casado con Gladys, de 51 años. Ambos tienen una hija, Magaly de 16 años de edad. En unión familiar ellos viven en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Unión Palomar (selva central peruana). El trabajo de Aurelio, consta en la agricultura, y la panadería. Todas las mañanas desde muy temprano él, se dirige a la una fuente de soda donde trabaja, ahí elabora los ricos panes y pasteles que deleitan todas las mañanas los pobladores de su localidad. Pero todos los fines de semana en compañía de su esposa cuidan de sus cultivos de café, ya tiene 15 años dedicándose a ello, y según menciona sus granos son muy reconocidos en la cooperativa de Alto Palomar, donde vende en cada campaña agrícola. Ahora están planeando hacer viveros de café, con los cuales renovaran sus plantaciones de café, con 3 mil plantitas; con ello obtendrán nuevos y mejores granos. Esta es la primera vez que tiene un crédito con MFP, y espera salir adelante con el apoyo de su banco comunal, los que trabajaran arduamente para salir adelante. Con el crédito que recibirá, planea comprar varios sacos de abono orgánico, los cuales esparcirá en sus cultivos de café, y si el crédito le alcanza invertirá en la contrata de peones para el mantenimiento de sus terrenos agrícolas.
texts.en:
Aurelio, age 41, is married to 51 year old Gladys.  They have a 16 year old daughter, Magaly.  The family lives together in their own house, which is located in Unión Palomar (central Peruvian jungle).

Aurelio’s work consists of farming and the bakery.  Very early every morning he heads to the soda fountain where he works.  He makes delicious breads and cakes, which delight the area’s inhabitants every morning.

Every week-end he and his wife take care of their coffee crop.  He has been doing this for 15 years.  He mentions that his grains are very well-known in the Alto Palomar cooperative, which is where he sells each farming season.

He is now planning to have a coffee nursery, which he will use to renew his coffee plantings with three thousand plants.  He will get new and better grains with them.

This is his first loan with MFP.  He hopes to get ahead with the support of his communal bank; its members are working arduously to get ahead.  He plans to use the loan he receives to buy sacks of organic fertilizer.  He will spread the fertilizer on his coffee crops.  If there is still money from the loan, he will hire workers to help with maintenance of his fields.

loans.use: Buy sacks of fertilizer and pay workers to help him in the fields

loans.name: Marleni

texts.es: Marleni, de 39 años, convive con Julio, de 47 años. Ambos tienen 3 hijos: Digna, de 16, Waderle, de 15 y Analy, de 7 meses de edad. E unión familiar ellos viven en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Unión Palomar (selva central peruana). Hace 12 años está emprendedora mujer se dedica a la siembra de café, con la ayuda de su esposo, siembra, fertiliza y cultiva, posteriormente los comercializa en la ciudad de La Merced. Lo que más le gusta a Marleni, es poder estar activa y trabajar sin parar, “me siento útil”, asegura. Por ello, cuando tienen la oportunidad, trabaja en diferentes haciendas, donde limpia la maleza que crece entre los cultivos. Segura de que podrá salir adelante, está planeando renovar sus plantaciones, con los viveros de café, ya comenzó embolsando algunas plantas. Esta es la primera vez que tiene un crédito con MFP, y agradece la confianza que depositaron en ella los integrantes de su banco comunal, pues está segura que unidos podrán salir adelante. Con el crédito que solicita, planea comprar plantas de café y plátanos, y de está manera renovará sus plantaciones antiguas.
texts.en:
Marleni is 39 years old, and she lives with 47 year old Julio.  They have three children; 16 year old Digna, 15 year old Waderle, and 7 month old Analy.  They live together in their own house, which is located in Unión Palomar (central Peruvian jungle).  

This enterprising woman has been growing coffee for 12 years.  Her husband helps her plant, fertilize, cultivate, and later sell the coffee in the city of La Merced.  What Marleni likes the most is being able to be active and working without stopping.  “I feel useful”, she declares.

When she has the opportunity, she works on different farms clearing the weeds that grow between the plants.  She is sure that she will be able to get ahead.  She is planning to renew her plants with the coffee nursery.  She has already started bagging some plants.

This is her first loan with MFP.  She is grateful for the confidence that the other members of her communal bank have placed in her.  She is certain that united they will be able to get ahead.  She plans to use the requested loan to buy coffee and banana plants.  That way she can renew her old plantations.

loans.use: To buy coffee and banana plants

loans.name: Chriss

texts.es: Chriss, de 27 años, está casada con Ángel, de 26 años. Ambos tienen una hermosa hija, Angelis, de un año de edad. En unión familiar ellos viven en su casa propia, ubicada en la comunidad Unión Palomar (selva central peruana). El trabajo arduo en el sembrío, fertilizar y cosechar, es el compromiso que asumió Chriss hace 8 años; pues según afirma desde muy niña, gusto del campo y producir la tierra. Ahora ella tiene más de 2 hectáreas de terrenos agrícolas, donde siembra plátanos a gran escalo, los cuales cosecha 2 veces al mes. Lo que más le gusta a Chriss, es poder negociar sus ricos plátanos por medio de los intermediarios, los cuales gustosos le aconsejas nuevos mercados donde ella puede expandirse y poder ofrecer sus frutos. Por ello más adelante desea convertirse en una comerciante mayorista, y poder viajar por todo el país ofreciendo frutas oriundas de la selva. Esta es primera vez que tiene un crédito con MFP, y espera salir adelante junto a su banco comunal que constan de personas comprometidas con el progreso. Con el crédito que solicita, planea comprar 3 bolsas de abono orgánico, los cuales esparcirá sobre los viveros de café que hace poco plantó.
texts.en:
Chriss, 27, is married to Ángel, 26. They have a beautiful daughter, Angelis, who is one year old. They live as a family in their own home, located in the Unión Palomar community (central Peruvian rainforest).   

Eight years ago, Chriss took on the commitment to do the arduous work of planting, fertilizing, and harvesting. She says that she has liked the country and the production of the land since she was a little girl. 

Now she has more than 2 hectacres of agricultural land, where she plants plantains on a large scale and harvests them twice a month. What Chriss likes best is being able to sell her delicious plantains through intermediaries, who willingly advise her on new markets where she can expand her sales and offer her fruits.  

In the future she wants to become a wholesale vendor and be able to travel around the whole country offering fruits native to the rainforest. 

This is her first loan with MFP, and she hopes to get ahead in life together with her communal bank that is made up of people who are committed to progress. With the requested loan, she plans to purchase 3 bags of organic fertilizer, which she will apply to beds of coffee that she recently planted.

loans.use: To purchase 3 bags of organic fertilizer

loans.name: Dany

texts.es: Dany, de 37 años convive con Richard, de 35 años. Ambos tienen una hija Mayeri, de 11 años. En unión familiar los tres viven en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Unión Palomar (selva central peruana). Está valerosa y dedicada mujer, se dedica al sembrío de café, donde todos los fines de semana, cuida, fertiliza y retira la maleza que crece entre sus cultivos. Ya tiene 4 años dedicándose a la agricultura, y lo que más le gusta a ella, es poder dedicar tiempo y esfuerzo a algo propio. Por ello en cada cosecha comercializa sus granos de café, en la cooperativa Alto Palomar. Dany, no se dedica únicamente a ello, pues hace tres años atrás, comenzó como promotora educativa en el servicio social del estado peruano, que consta de enseñar a leer, escribir y mejorar la psico motricidad de niños mayores de tres años. Esta es la primera vez que tiene un crédito con MFP, y está segura que todos que integran su banco comunal, logran salir adelante entre ellos. Con el crédito que solicita, planea comprar varios sacos de abono, los cuales esparcirá en sus cultivos de café.
texts.en:
Dany 37, lives with Richard, 35.  They both have a daughter, Mayeri, 11.  The three of them live together as a family in their own house located in Unión Palomar (Peruvian central jungle).  This brave and dedicated woman is a coffee farmer.  Every weekend she tends to her crops fertilizing them and removing weeds that grow among her plants.  She has been in this line of work for 4 years and what she enjoys the most about it is being able to dedicate time and effort to something of her own.  She sells each harvest of coffee beans at the Alto Palomar Cooperative.

Dany isn’t just a farmer.  Three years ago she started working as an educational promoter for the Peruvian State’s social services; she teaches reading, writing and ways of improving psychomotor skills of children older than 3 years.

This is her first loan with MFP and she is sure that all the members of the communal bank will be able to get ahead together.

She will use the requested loan to buy several sacks of manure to spread among her coffee plants.

loans.use: To buy sacks of manure.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: María, de 43 años, convive con Luis, de 55 años. Ambos tienen 6 hijos, pero solo vive con tres de ellos: Martín, de 16, Rosario, de 9 y Luis, de 2 años de edad. En unión familiar ellos viven en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Unión Palomar (selva central peruana). La constancia y el esfuerza de está pareja, hicieron que obtengan 3 hectáreas de terrenos agrícolas. María, se esfuerza mucho por mantener la unión familiar, y apoyar en el mantenimiento de sus cultivos a su esposo Luis, quien afirma que desde que consolidaron una familia, hace ya 20 años; comenzaron a sembrar café y plátanos; hasta hoy el apoyo que obtiene de ella, lo motiva, “ella es muy hábil para la venta”, asegura. María, después de cada cosecha, comercializa su fruto de plátanos en la ciudad de La Merced, pero su grano de café los vende en la cooperativa de que formaron en la comunidad de Alto Palomar, Pero como socios, María, está feliz de poder tener el apoyo constante de su esposo, juntos desean abonar y mejorar los cuidados de sus sembríos, y de esa manera incrementar su producción. Esta es la primera vez que tiene un crédito con MFP, y espera que junto a los integrantes de su banco comunal, puedan salir adelante en el progreso de está asociación. Con el crédito que solicita, planea comprar varios sacos de abono orgánico que esparcirá en sus diferentes cultivos.
texts.en:
María, 43, lives with Luis, 55.  They have six children together but only three of them, Martín, 16, Rosario, 9 and Luis, 2, still live with them together as a family in their own house located in Unión Palomar (Peruvian central jungle).  The constancy and effort of this couple led to their having 3 hectares of farmland.

María works hard to keep the family together and help her husband care for the crops who states that since they formed their family 20 years ago they started planting bananas and coffee and the support he gets from her motivates him to this day.  “She is very skilled at sales,” he assures us.

María sells each banana harvest in the city of La Merced but she sells the coffee beans to the cooperative that was formed in the community of Alto Palomar.  As members, though, María is happy to have her husband’s constant support.  Together they want to fertilize and improve the care of their crops in order to increase production.

This is the first time she’s gotten a loan from MFP and she hopes that together with the members of the communal bank they will get ahead with the organization’s progress.

She will use the requested loan to buy several sacks of organic manure to spread among her various crops.

loans.use: To buy several sacks of manure.

loans.name: Antonia

texts.es: Antonia, de 53 años, es una valerosa madre soltera de 8 hijos, pero sólo vive con uno de ellos; José Luis, de 20 años de edad, quien le ayuda a salir adelante, en su casa propia ubicada en la localidad de Unión Palomar (selva central peruana). La siembra de café y plátanos, es su principal actividad económica, ya tiene 20 años dedicándose a la agricultura, en todo este tiempo según menciona  pudo lograr muchos avances en el cuidado de sus sembríos, los cuales tienen gran acogida en una empresa reconocida de producción de café; pero conocedora de las oportunidades que tienen los que producen un grano de buena calidad. Antonia, piensa mejorar la calidad de sus productos, con la asociación del intermediario Damian, con él que comercializa café en épocas de campaña agrícola. Esta es la primera vez que tiene un crédito con MFP, y asegura que con el esfuerzo conjunto de los integrantes de su banco comunal, los cuales son personas integras, podrán salir adelante. Con el crédito que solicita, planea comprar varios sacos de abono orgánico los cuales esparcirá en sus viveros de café.
texts.en:
Antonia, 53, is a brave single mother of 8 children only one of whom, José Luis, 20, still lives with her and helps her get ahead.  They live in her own house located in Unión Palomar (Peruvian central jungle).  Her main economic activity is banana and coffee farming.  She has been a farmer for 20 years.  During all this time she tells us she’s accomplished several advances in crop care which are well received in a local firm known for coffee production who are knowledgeable of the opportunities those producing a good quality grain have .

Antonia intends to improve the quality of her products with the help of an intermediary, Damian, with whom she sells coffee during the planting seasons.

This is the first time she’s had a loan with MFP and she assures that with the joint effort of the members of the communal bank who are all upstanding people, they will persevere.

She will use the requested loan to by several sacks of organic manure to spread among her coffee nurseries.

loans.use: To buy sacks of manure.

loans.name: Rafael

texts.es: Rafael, de 35 años, convive con Cledia, de 32 años. Ambos tienen 4 hijos, pero solo vive con 3 años: Junior, de 15, Sarai, de 13 y Amitai, de 3 meses de edad. En unión familiar ellos viven en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Unión Palomar (selva central peruano). La siembra de café, plátanos, es la principal actividad económica de Rafael; junto a su esposa e hijos todos los fines de semana se dedican al cuidado de sus sembríos, los cuales después de cada cosecha los comercializa en las ciudades de La Merced y Villarica, donde viaja constantemente. Ya tiene 5 años dedicándose a la agricultura, y para más adelante está planeando mejorar la calidad de sus frutos, pues desea incursionar en el negocio de las licitaciones, donde podrá abastecer los requerimientos del estado peruano, en los diferentes comedores populares, cárceles y demás instituciones. Esta es la primera vez que tiene un crédito con MFP, y asegura que el trabajo conjunto, compromiso y solidaridad, lograrán que su banco comunal, sea una de los mejores. Con el crédito que recibirá, planea comprar lo necesario para plantar viveros, y si el dinero le alcanza invertirá en la limpieza de sus terrenos agrícolas.
texts.en:
Rafael, 35, lives with Cledia, 32.  They have four children together but only three live with them: Junior, 15, Sarai, 13 and Amitai, 3 months.  They live together as a family in their own house located in Unión Palomar (Peruvian central jungle).  His main economic activity is banana and coffee farming.  Together with his wife and children they dedicate every weekend to their plants.  Each harvest is then sold in the cities of La Merced and Villarica where he travels to constantly.

He has been a farmer for 5 years and later on plans to improve the quality of his fruits because he wants to go into the business of bidding for requirements of the Peruvian state to supply popular dining rooms, jails and other institutions.

This is the first loan he’s had with MFP and he assures that the joint work, commitment and solidarity will make his communal bank be one of the best ones.

He will use the loan he’ll get to buy what he needs for his nurseries and if there is enough money he will invest in clearing his fields.

loans.use: To buy coffee and banana plants as well as to hire laborers to clear the fields that will be planted.

loans.name: Humberto

texts.es: Humberto, de 18 años, es un hombre soltero y trabajador, que vive en compañía de su tío Armando, de 46 años, con quien vive en una casa alquilada, ubicada en la ciudad de La Merced. El trabajo al que se dedica, Humberto, es la venta de electrodomésticos, y demás equipos tecnológicos en una reconocida empresa del país, ya tiene 3 meses trabajando en está empresa, y según menciona está orgulloso de poder poner en práctica sus técnicas de venta. Ya que según menciona, desde que era adolescente más o menos, hace 5 años, se dedica a la siembra de café y plátanos; los cuales heredó de su abuela Dora, de 71 años de edad; donde todos los fines de semana, cultiva y abona sus 3 hectáreas de terrenos agrícolas que producen en su mayoría café, los que gracias a su capacidad de poder de negociación,  vende en un cooperativa muy reconocida de exportación. Está es la primera vez que tiene un crédito con MFP, y espera logar sus objetivos con la ayuda de su banco comunal, conformado por personas integras y honestas. Con el crédito que solicita, planea comprar varios sacos de abono orgánico los cuales esparcirá en sus cultivos de café, y si el dinero le alcanza invertirá en la contrata de peones para que le ayude en el mantenimiento de café.
texts.en:
Humberto, 18, is a single, hard working man living with his uncle, Armando, 46, in a rented house located in the city of La Merced.  Humberto sells home appliances and other technological devices in a firm that is well known nationwide.  He has been working for this firm for 3 months and he mentions that he’s proud to put his sales techniques to use.  He states that since he’s been an adolescent, five years more or less, he has farmed coffee and bananas that he inherited from his grandmother, Dora, 71.  Every weekend he cultivates and applies manure to his three hectares of farmland that produce mostly coffee which, thanks to his gifts for negotiation, he sells to a well known export cooperative.

This is the first time he’s gotten a loan from MFP and hopes to reach his goals with help from his communal bank which is composed of upstanding, honest people.

He will use the requested loan to buy several sacks of organic manure to spread among his coffee plants and if there is enough money will invest in hiring laborers to help him care for the coffee.

loans.use: To buy sacks of manure and to hire laborers to care for the coffee crops.

loans.name: Faithful Group

texts.en:
In the photo are members of the “Faithful” group. They are small-scale entrepreneurs based in Makeni, a city in northern Sierra Leone. These entrepreneurs are seeking a loan of SLL 1,800,000.00 from SMT/Kiva lenders. With this loan, they will be able to expand their businesses, make more profit and consequently, improve their standard of living. 

The leader of this group is Christiana B.. Christiana is 35 years old. She was born in  Freetown, Sierra Leone’s capital city. Currently, she is residing in Makeni together with her husband and three children. Her husband is a driver. Two of her children are attending primary school and one is in secondary school. For two years now, Christiana has been selling cigarettes, biscuits, mints, soft drinks, etc. With this loan, she will be able to expand her business by buying the above-mentioned items in large quantity to add to her current stock.

loans.use: To buy cigarettes, biscuits, mints, soft drinks, etc. in large quantity to add to her current stock

loans.name: Deolita

texts.en: Deolita A. is a married woman who lives in Sitio Quarry, Brgy Rafaela Barrera, Sagay City, Negros Occidental. She earns her living by selling Ready-to-Wear (RTW) clothes. Her husband, Elesio A., age 56, earns his living as a vendor and also helps with his wife's business. They have four children who are 19 to 33 years old. Deolita joined NWTF-Project Dungganon in 1998 because she wanted something better for her family. With the help of her past 19 loans from NWTF-Project Dungganon, and by the sweat of her brow, Deolita has been incrementally lifting her family out of poverty. Her previous loan of 29,500 Philippine pesos (PHP) helped her earn a monthly profit of 16,000 PHP, improving her family's standard of living. This time, for her 20th loan, she is borrowing 29,500 PHP, which she intends to use as additional capital for her business so that she can continue to save up for the future of her family. Deolita A. is a Dungganon woman who is following an honorable path toward the achievement of her dreams. About NWTF: In a world full of challenges, Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation (NWTF), is making a difference in the lives of thousands of women through Project Dungganon (a Hiligaynon word that means honorable). Through the alleviation program, NWTF is empowering these women to progress from earning less than $1 a day to achieving realities that surpass even their dreams. They have taken a life path that will ultimately make them Dungganon - a title of esteem that is bestowed on a member of a community who has earned respect through a lifetime of hard and honest work. Help NWTF continue its mission to help the poorest in the Philippines by clicking the link to the NWTF Kiva lending team on Kiva.org to join our team.

loans.use: For additional working capital

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Viriginia

texts.en: Viriginia R. is a married woman who lives in Brgy. Bungtod, Bogo City, Cebu. She earns her living by operating a sari-sari (general store) and a boarding house. Her husband, Elpidio R., age 48, works as a construction worker to earn his living. They have six children who are 9 to 27 years old. Two of her children are working and four are currently going to school. Viriginia joined NWTF-Project Dungganon in 2008 because she wanted something better for her family. With the help of her past five loans from NWTF-Project Dungganon, and by the sweat of her brow, Viriginia has been incrementally lifting her family out of poverty. Her previous loan of 10,000 Philippine pesos (PHP) helped her earn a monthly profit of 10,000 PHP, improving her family's standard of living. This time, for her sixth loan, she is borrowing 10,000 PHP, which she intends to use as additional working capital so that she can continue to save up for the future education of her children. Viriginia R. is a Dungganon woman who is following an honorable path toward the achievement of her dreams. About NWTF: In a world full of challenges, Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation (NWTF), is making a difference in the lives of thousands of women through Project Dungganon (a Hiligaynon word that means honorable). Through the alleviation program, NWTF is empowering these women to progress from earning less than $1 a day to achieving realities that surpass even their dreams. They have taken a life path that will ultimately make them Dungganon - a title of esteem that is bestowed on a member of a community who has earned respect through a lifetime of hard and honest work. Help NWTF continue its mission to help the poorest in the Philippines by clicking the link to the NWTF Kiva lending team on Kiva.org to join our team.

loans.use: For additional working capital

loans.name: Vergenia

texts.en:
Vergenia H. is a 47-year old widow who supports her family by operating a general store. She lives in Hillside, Daanbantayan, Cebu, and she has been a member of NWTF-Project Dungganon since 2007. Combined with her individual efforts, Vergenia has improved her living conditions with the help of the loans from NWTF. By working hard in her general store she is gradually making her family more economically stable. She now earns an average monthly income of PHP 5000. 

Vergenia is borrowing PHP 25000 so she can purchase more inventory for her general store, and this will be her 7th loan from NWTF-Project Dungganon. Her previous loan of PHP18000 was paid off well within its term, and it was another step in her journey toward economic freedom. Vergenia aspires to elevate her family's living conditions and ensure their future well-being by following the Dungganon way. 

About NWTF: In a world full of challenges, Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation (NWTF), is making a difference in the lives of thousands of women through Project Dungganon (a Hiligaynon word that means Honorable). Through the alleviation program, NWTF is empowering these women to progress from earning less than $1 a day to achieving realities that surpass even their dreams. They have taken a life path that will ultimately make them Dungganon - a title of esteem that is bestowed to a member of a community who has earned the respect through a lifetime of hard and honest work. Help NWTF continue its mission to help the poorest in the Philippines by clicking  the link to the   NWTF Kiva lending team  on Kiva.org to join our team.
"

loans.use: Purchase more inventory

loans.name: Florentina

texts.en:
Florentina  C. is a married woman who lives in Fatima Village, Brgy.Rizal, San Carlos City, Negros Occidental. She earns her living as a Pepsi products wholesaler and operating a general store business. Her husband Escolastico, who is 56 years old, is a businessman, and also helps in Florentina's business activities. They have four children who are 20 to 27 years old.

Florentina  joined NWTF-Project Dungganon in 2001 because she aspired for something better for her family. With the help of her previous 19 loans from NWTF-Project Dungganon, Florentina has been incrementally lifting her family's quality of life by the sweat of her brow. Her previous loan of PHP 23,000 helped her earn a monthly profit of PHP 20,000, uplifting the family's standard of living. This time, for her 20th cycle loan, she is borrowing PHP 26,000, which she intends to use as capital so she can sell soft drinks in the local school canteen, and expand her business.  She will continue to save up for future business improvements so that she can help in the education of her niece, nephew and her extended family. Florentina C. is a Dungganon woman who is following an honorable path toward the achievement of her dreams. 

About NWTF: In a world full of challenges, Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation (NWTF), is making a difference in the lives of thousands of women through Project Dungganon (a Hiligaynon word that means Honorable). Through the alleviation program, NWTF is empowering these women to progress from earning less than $1 a day to achieving realities that surpass even their dreams. They have taken a life path that will ultimately make them Dungganon - a title of esteem that is bestowed to a member of a community who has earned the respect through a lifetime of hard and honest work. Help NWTF continue its mission to help the poorest in the Philippines by clicking  the link to the   NWTF Kiva lending team  on Kiva.org to join our team.

loans.use: Fund soft drink wholesaling operations

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Rosalie

texts.en:
Rosalie S. is a married woman who lives in Purok Tomas, Brgy. Kawit, Medellin, Cebu. She earns her living by operating a fruit vending business. Her husband Nelson S. also works as a fruit vendor, and helps in Rosalie's business activities. They have five children who are 5 to 19 years old. Two children are working and two children are going to school. 

Rosalie joined NWTF-Project Dungganon in 2008 because she aspired for something better for her family. With the help of her previous 5 loans from NWTF-Project Dungganon, Rosalie has been incrementally lifting her family out of poverty by the sweat of her brow.
